Transformations Class Reference

#include <transdlg.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

c_des: Class Transformations. c_des: This class is used to show a transformations dialog, in which can be mirrored and moved horizontally and c_des: vertically, scaled(factor), rotated(degrees) and the direction can be given (clockwise or counter clockwise).
